pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: They want Beijing out of the World Trade Organization.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望中國脫離世界貿易組織。

sentences.english: The battle lines of the new world order were exposed at the World Trade Organization this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週，新世界秩序的各條戰線在世界貿易組織曝光了。

sentences.english: The post-accession Chinese market is going to be more open.
sentences.chinese: 加入世界貿易組織後，中國將進一步改善市場環境。

sentences.english: And help speed-up plans for Vietnam to join the world Trade Organisation.
sentences.chinese: 並加速越南加入世界貿易組織計劃的實施。

sentences.english: Its primary function is the implementation and administration of the Plurilateral Trade Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 世界貿易組織的主要職能是執行和管理多邊貿易協議。

sentences.english: Overall arrangements were made for work after the transition period following China's entry into the WTO.
sentences.chinese: 全面部署了加入世界貿易組織後過渡期的各項工作。

sentences.english: The Sixth WTO Ministerial Conference will be held in Hong Kong, China.
sentences.chinese: 第六屆世界貿易組織部長級會議將在中國香港舉行。

sentences.english: All GCC countries are members of the World Trade Organization (WTO).
sentences.chinese: 海灣合作委員會的所有國家都是世界貿易組織成員。

sentences.english: These requirements and extortions explicitly violate prohibitions of the World Trade Organization.
sentences.chinese: 那些要求和勒索明確地違反了世界貿易組織的禁令。

sentences.english: Negotiations on China's accession to the World Trade Organization(WTO) have been going on for 15years.
sentences.chinese: 中國加入世界貿易組織的談判已經進行了15年。

sentences.english: China supports Azerbaijan's accession to the World Trade Organization (WTO).
sentences.chinese: 中國支持阿塞拜疆加入世界貿易組織。

sentences.english: Another way the WTO has helped limit protection is through accession agreements.
sentences.chinese: 世界貿易組織限制保護主義的另一個渠道是入世協定。

sentences.english: The primary function of WTO is the implementation and administration of the Plurilateral Trade Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 世界貿易組織的主要職能是執行和管理多邊貿易協議。

sentences.english: It stands for World Trade Organization.

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
special drawing rights (SDR), international currency of the IMF
Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, OECD/abbr. for 經濟合作與發展組織|经济合作与发展组织
signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty

pinyin: Ya4 Tai4 Jing1 He2 Zu3 zhi1
Ya4 zhou1 Kai1 fa1 Yin2 hang2
